CustomField.description: The email of this user, as sourced from the authentication provider used to login. This is what they've set it to in their Google Account, or Salesforce profile, or LinkedIn profile
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The email of this user, as sourced from the authentication provider used to login. This is what they've set it to in their Google Account, or Salesforce profile, or LinkedIn profile
CustomField.label: Email
